STAC Catalogue.Description: RACE indicators are provided as a STAC Catalogue - a standardized way to expose collections of spatial temporal data.

EOxHub Workspaces.Description: For tutorials, data cataloguing and narrative creation EOxHub Workspaces platform is used. It is a cloud-based environment for EO professionals, researchers, and data scientists where individuals or teams can work with geospatial services and applications.

eodash.Description: The eodash ecosystem is an aggregation of tools conceptualized around STAC allowing allowing in a federated way to integrate EO data into an overarching service package. The main tools are a web client dashboard library eodash as well as a catalog generator that provide the basis for integration of many types of endpoints.

Jupyter Notebooks.Description: Whether you're an citizen, provider, educator, or simply curious, the RACE Dashboard also serves as a valuable educational resource. Many indicators are accompanied by support materials - including example notebooks - that show how the data was produced and how it can be accessed and analyzed further.
